complaint.fullInstructions: âš¡ï¸ Quick complaint submission. â„¹ï¸ To submit a scam complaint, you need to gather the following information first: 1. Scammer's username or Telegram ID. 2. Situation description [500 characters max] 3. Photo/Video evidence of scam [2 to 10 media files] â€¼ï¸ Submitting a complaint that doesn't match the form or complaints containing potential spam with the intent to harm or slow down the complaint service will result in a ban on submitting complaints, blocking in the bot or addition to the suspicious participants database. ğŸ”¸ By clicking "Fill Form", you automatically agree to the above rules.
